other_tests.findings: A single metastasis is noted in the right frontoparietal region, measuring 1.6 x 2.1 cm, smaller compared to the prior examination (3.5 x 3.5 cm). There is lesser surrounding vasogenic edema. No new metastases are identified.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The metastasis decreased in size from 3.5 x 3.5 cm to 1.6 x 2.1 cm.
